name: ProSent Mobile - VIZL
tag_list: social-shopping, fashion, mobile, retail, digital-dressing-room, augmented-reality, virtualization
overview:
The Ultimate Social Shopping Platform for Fashion

VIZL delivers a personalized, entertaining and interactive experience throughout the entire customer journey, from product/brand discovery through purchase.

Developed by an experienced team with a background in technology, retail and fashion – VIZL is the result of 2+ years of R&D that incorporates the very latest technology to provide a virtual social shopping experience, anywhere – mobile, social, web or in stores.

Try-on fashion items, auto size for the perfect fit, find matching accessories, share and purchase.

Use VIZL to create a “personalized digital dressing room” that they can use while shopping online or in stores, anywhere – at home, while sitting in a cross-town bus or on a trip to the mall. A shopper simply takes a picture of herself or a friend, accesses the latest fashions (apparel, jewelry, eye wear etc..) from her favorite retailers, tries on the items digitally to create unique looks, and shares.
